tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]

sentences.english: They will study at home on computers.
sentences.chinese: 他们将在家用电脑上课。

sentences.english: Endoscopic ultrasonography and computerized tomography demonstrated the lesion to be a cyst in nature.
sentences.chinese: 内视镜超音波与电脑断层检查也证明此病灶为囊状物。

sentences.english: He deposits ten dollars, and the computer lights up and asks for the urine sample.
sentences.chinese: 付过10块钱后，电脑启动了，并提示他提供尿样。

sentences.english: All laptops in our shop are brand new and authentic.
sentences.chinese: 本店所售笔记本电脑均为全新正品行货。

sentences.english: Playing video games in the recreation facility.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在娱乐室里玩电脑游戏。

sentences.english: The machine is controlled by micro-computer, and it adopts stepping motor to feed materials.
sentences.chinese: 本机采用微机电脑控制，步进电机拖料。

sentences.english: Computers let you try out different styles and ideas.
sentences.chinese: 电脑能让你尝试不同的风格和点子。

sentences.english: Playing computer games all day lavishes parents' hard-earned money.
sentences.chinese: 整天玩电脑游戏浪费父母的血汗钱。

sentences.english: You can uSE your comp uter to create your own fashion spreadsheet.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用电脑创建自己的穿衣表。

sentences.english: Residents do not indicate their preferences will be assigned a roommate by computer draws.
sentences.chinese: 未有选择房伴者，将由电脑随机编配。

sentences.english: The telephone operator who looks up telephong(telephone) numbers uses a computer.
sentences.chinese: 电话接线员使用电脑来查询电话号码。

sentences.english: The one internet I can put Chinese software is in trouble. USD1.4 an hour.
sentences.chinese: 只有一台电脑可以装中文软件，但最后还是出了问题。

sentences.english: A mini-spectrometer that applied to computer color match system is introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种应用于电脑配色系统的小型光谱仪。

sentences.english: Jim was so engrossed in his computer games that he did not hear his mother call.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆埋头玩电脑游戏，一点都没有听到母亲的叫唤声。

sentences.english: She was busy (in) learning computer then.
sentences.chinese: 她那时正在忙于学电脑。
